name: Mecha Tower Defense
description:
A Tower Defense Strategy Game.  Utilizing GameDevHQ Filebase Assets the Player is able to fight against an onslaught of Mechs that are out to destroy you.

Game play Features:

  • Currency System
  • Tower Placement
  • Multiple Enemy Waves with increasing difficulty
  • Tower Upgrades
  • Fast Forward
  • Pause and set your towers

Currently the only available build is for Windows using the MechTD.zip file.
